content.text:
# List of presidents of the Senate (Belgium)__disambig_1

]]
]]
The president of the Senate (, ) is the presiding officer of the upper house of the Federal Parliament of Belgium. The current president of the Senate is Vincent Blondel.
It is custom that the president gets its portrait painted by an artist, in the collection of art of the Senate some famous works can be found like portraits painted by Alfred Cluysenaar.
